name: Star Wars - The Force Unleashed [NDS]
description: The STAR WARS® saga continues in STAR WARS®: THE FORCE UNLEASHED™, a videogame developed by LucasArts, which casts players as Darth Vader’s “Secret Apprentice” and promises to unveil new revelations about the STAR WARS® galaxy. The expansive story is set during the largely unexplored era between STAR WARS: Episode III REVENGE OF THE SITH and STAR WARS: Episode IV A NEW HOPE.
